Uses of Interface
b2bpl.translation.TranslationContext

Packages that use TranslationContext
b2bpl.translation Contains classes immediately related to the translation of bytecode classes to BoogiePL. 
 

Uses of TranslationContext in b2bpl.translation
 

Classes in b2bpl.translation that implement TranslationContext
private  class Translator.Context
          Implementation of the TranslationContext interface which handles the translation of different kinds of references.
 

Fields in b2bpl.translation declared as TranslationContext
private  TranslationContext ModifiesFilter.context
          The translation context to be used during the translation of the current BML store reference.
private  TranslationContext MethodTranslator.context
          The translation context to be used during the translation of the current bytecode method.
private  TranslationContext SpecificationTranslator.context
          The translation context to be used during the translation of the current BML specification.

 BPLProcedure MethodTranslator.translate(TranslationContext context, BCMethod method)
          Performs the actual translation of the given bytecode method and returns a BoogiePL procedure representing it.
 BPLExpression SpecificationTranslator.translate(TranslationContext context, BMLExpression specification)
          Performs the actual translation of the given BML specification and returns a BoogiePL expression representing it.
 BPLExpression ModifiesFilter.translate(TranslationContext context, BMLStoreRef... storeRefs)
          Performs the actual translation of the given BML store references and returns a BoogiePL predicate which is true if and only if the location passed to the constructor of this class does not refer to any of the store references provided here.
